title: Engineer, Creative, Strategist.
bio_part_1: With a foundation forged over 20 years in software engineering, today I merge technical rigor with a passion for creativity and conversion strategy. My specialty is forging elite digital ecosystems: from high-conversion sales funnels to PWAs with a *Mobile-First* philosophy.
bio_part_2: To do this, I've built my own arsenal: my sovereign AI co-pilot LIA Legacy and a methodology that accelerates development. I don't build sites, I build scalable assets designed for one thing: results.
